dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S419 RS: Reauthorizing Support and Treatment for Officers in Crisis Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hawley (for himself, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Coons, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Welch, Mr. Booker, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Sheehy, and Ms. Cortez Masto) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary
Reported by Mr. Grassley, without amendment

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize grants to support law enforcement officers and families, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Reauthorizing Support and Treatment for Officers in Crisis Act of 2025.
Section 1001(a)(21) of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10261(a)(21)) is amended by striking 2020 through 2024 and inserting 2025 through 2029.
